Title: Fuwawa
GameText: POWER: Either draw 2 cards, or 1 Hero target regains 3 HP.

Title: Mococo
GameText: POWER: Mococo deals 1 target 2 melee damage. You may discard 1 card. If you do, draw 1 card.

Title: Backseating
GameText:
After this card is played, if Fuwawa is active, draw 1 card.
POWER: Fuwawa deals Mococo 1 fixed psychic damage. You may use 1 power. +2 to damage dealt by Mococo using that power.

Title: Big Sister Knows Best
GameText:
DRAW PHASE
You may draw 1 additional card this phase.
END PHASE
Fuwawa deals Mococo 1 fixed psychic damage. You may use 1 power.

Title: Demon Dog Claws
GameText:
After Mococo deals damage to a target with a power, she deals that target 1 irreducible infernal damage.
POWER: Mococo deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each.

Title: Demon Guard Dog
GameText:
REACTION: If Fuwawa would be dealt damage, redirect that damage to Mococo. -2 to damage redirected this way.
START PHASE
If Fuwawa is active, Mococo regains 2 HP.

Title: Dogged Persistence
GameText:
If Fuwawa or Mococo are incapacitated, flip them to their active side and restore them to 6 HP.
1 Hero target regains 3 HP.
Draw 1 card.

Title: FUWAMOCO Morning
GameText:
1 target in your play area regains 3 HP.
If a character in your play area is at their maximum HP, summon 1 Ongoing card. Otherwise, draw 3 cards.

Title: Hello, hello, BAU BAU!
GameText:
Mococo deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
If Fuwawa is active, discover 1 Ongoing card.
If both Fuwawa and Mococo are active, play 1 card. Otherwise, salvage 1 card.

Title: No thoughts, just jam
GameText:
Discard any number of cards.
Each Hero target in your play area regains X HP, where X is the number of cards discarded this way.
If X is at least 2, discover 1 Ongoing card.

Title: Not Tomorrow, Today!
GameText:
After this card is played, if Mococo is active, draw 1 card.
POWER: Reveal and replace the top card of 1 Hero deck. Play the top card of 1 ally Hero's deck.

Title: Pero
GameText:
START PHASE
Either discard 1 card, or each Hero character in this play area deals Pero 1 fixed psychic damage.
END PHASE
Pero deals 1 fixed psychic damage to each Hero character in this play area. Draw or play 1 card.

Title: Pup Talk
GameText:
If Mococo is active, each Hero target regains 1 HP.
If Fuwawa is active, each Hero draws 1 card.

Title: Puppy Swipe
GameText:
Mococo deals 1 target 4 melee damage.
If Fuwawa is active, draw 1 card.

Title: The Fluffy One
GameText:
If Fuwawa is active, up to 3 Hero targets regain 2 HP each.
If Mococo is active, discover 1 Ongoing card.

Title: The Fuzzy One
GameText:
Mococo deals up to 3 targets 2 melee damage each.
If Fuwawa is active, +1 to that damage.

Title: Twin Energy
GameText:
After you play a card that causes a target to regain HP, draw 1 card.
After you play a card that causes a target to deal damage, draw 1 card.
